DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the diagnostic efficiency of pyrosequencing for the mutant BRAF allele in ultrasound (US)-guided fine needle aspiration biopsies (FNAB) of thyroid incidentalomas.
DOC.criteria: Patients with thyroid nodule larger than 1 cm, or nodule smaller than 1 cm that required further evaluation because of suspicious ultrasound findings Patients who refuse participation.
